hero.description: Create customized workout programs with AI, track your progress with detailed graphs and reach your goals faster than ever.

howItWorks.title: HOW IT
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started with Gymdagboken in six easy steps

step1.title: 1. Create account
step1.description: Sign up for free in seconds. You only need an email address to get started.

step2.title: 2. Generate program
step2.description: Tell us about your goals, experience level and how often you want to train. Our AI creates a customized program for you.

step3.title: 3. Train and log
step3.description: Follow your program and log each session. The app remembers your weights and suggests progression.

step4.title: 4. Track your progress
step4.description: See your success with detailed graphs and statistics. Celebrate personal bests with confetti!

step5.title: 5. Set goals
step5.description: Set personal goals for each exercise. Get notified when you hit them and earn XP.

step6.title: 6. Compete with friends
step6.description: Invite friends, challenge them to competitions and see who trains the hardest!

pricing.title: SIMPLE
pricing.subtitle: Start for free and upgrade when you're ready to remove ads and unlock all features.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about Gymdagboken.

q1.question: Is Gymdagboken free to use?
q1.answer: Yes! The basic version of Gymdagboken is completely free. You can log workouts, track your progress and use AI-generated workout programs at no cost. The Premium version for 19 SEK/month removes all ads.

q2.question: How do the AI workout programs work?
q2.answer: Our AI analyzes your goals, experience level and available training days to create a customized workout program. You can customize the program by adding/removing exercises, changing order and adjusting sets and reps.

q3.question: Can I track both strength training and cardio?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Gymdagboken has separate features for strength training and cardio activities like running, swimming, cycling and more. You get detailed statistics for both types.

q4.question: How does the social system work?
q4.answer: You can invite friends via a unique invite link, see each other's statistics and challenge each other to competitions. Compete for most workouts, most time or most sets over a chosen period.

q5.question: Does the app work offline?
q5.answer: Yes, Gymdagboken is built as a PWA (Progressive Web App) which means you can install it on your phone and use basic features even without an internet connection.

q6.question: How do I install the app on my phone?
q6.answer: On Android: Open gymdagboken.se in Chrome and tap 'Add to home screen'. On iPhone: Open in Safari, tap the share button and select 'Add to Home Screen'.
